name: named-resume-schema
description: A JSON schema for a resume

contactInformation.description: The person's contact information might include FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone, Address, City, State, Zip, Country

positionOrProfessionalTitle.description: The position or professional title of the person, such as 'Software Engineer' or 'Data Scientist'

professionalSummary.description: A brief summary, no more than 4 sentences, of the person's professional experience and goals in their career

workExperience.description: A list of the person's work experience or jobs that they have held

companyName.description: The name of the company the person worked for

locationOrRemote.description: The location of where the person worked for the company, like 'San Francisco, CA', Or Remote if the person worked from home

duration.description: The start and end dates of the person's' employment at the company, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' or 'YYYY-MM' or 'YYYY'

start.description: The start date of the person's employment at the company

end.description: The end date of the person's employment at the company

positionOrTitle.description: The position or title the person held at the company, such as 'Software Engineer' or 'Data Scientist'

responsibilitiesAccomplishments.description: A list of the person's responsibilities or noteable accomplishments during their time at the company

education.description: A list of the person's education history, including degrees and institutions

institution.description: The name of the institution the person attended, such as 'Stanford University' or 'UC Berkeley'

degree.description: The degree the person earned at the institution, such as ('BS' or 'Bachelor of Science'), or ('MFA' or 'Master of Fine Arts')
The focus or major of the person's degree, such as 'Computer Science' or 'Art History'

gradePointAveage.description: The grade or GPA the person earned while attending the institution, such as '3.5' or 'B+'

duration.description: The start and end dates of the person's attendance at the institution, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' or 'YYYY-MM' or 'YYYY'

start.description: The start date of the person's attendance at the institution

end.description: The end date of the person's attendance at the institution

skills.description: A comma-separated list of the person's skills, such as 'Python', 'Machine Learning', 'React', 'Data Analysis'

certifications.description: A comma-separated list of the person's certifications, such as 'AWS Certified Solutions Architect', 'Google Analytics Certified'

publications.description: A list of the person's publications, such as books, articles, or research papers

patents.description: A list of the person's patents or inventions

items.description: A list of the person's websites or online profiles, such as LinkedIn, GitHub, or a URL to their personal website
